list: The Lottie Moon Christmas Card drive has begun and will continue until Wednesday, December 17. If you want to send people in the church a card, please bring the cards and 78 cents per card to Mike Baker, Butch Grubb, or Brian Lewis.
Next Sunday evening: Quarterly business meeting.

The ladies Christmas party will be on Monday, December 8 at 6:00 PM at Ann Deatonâ€™s garage. Please bring your favorite finger food and/or dessert. Also bring an ornament or Christmas decor item for the exchange game. All ladies are invited!
Frank Plessinger will teach a high school/college age Sunday School beginning in January.
